website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a spacious inflatable model with plenty of space for relaxing in the sun, this large pool is worth considering.
pros: Stands out for its large size that provides enough space for families, including several kids or adults
The four seats with backrests make it ideal for lounging and relaxing in the water
cons: Walls feel slightly flimsy, and can allow water to escape, especially when placed on uneven surfaces
Seat backs have to be inflated separately

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: YOU HAVE TO BE A GYMNEST OR CONTORTIONIST TO SET THIS UP!!!  TERRIBLY DIFFICULT TO INFLATE
customer_reviews.text: Although I was so excited to order this, BEWARE!! IT IS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO INFLATE. I am not a young person. I could have handled one quick electric pump to set up the inflation BUT surprise??!! there are 8, yes 8 other smaller nozzles that have to be inflated before you sit in this mess. The nozzles do not fit the electric pump so I would seriously have the lie down in the base and try to get my mouth on each nozzle to 'hand' inflate!! I can imagine the neighbors watching this!!! And of course, it doesn't get hot enough here until mid-June and by the time I asked for a refund....seller said too late.
customer_reviews.author: Gale G. Trausch

customer_reviews.title: Apparently some of these have defects...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this exact same pool from Walmart a few months ago, but we had a big thunderstorm come through and it ruined the pool. I found this on amazon, and finally had a day off of work and blew it up (with a pump) and filled it up. Literally, 1.5-2 hours after inflating it, I go outside to get in it and this is what I see... the water was not over the max fill line, nor was there a visible defect. A total waste of Gallo’s of water that I will have to pay for along with a waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Badaroux

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was going to be the best pool, and it was initially
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be the best pool, and it was initially. However, it has to be inflated every day, which is kind of annoying. Also, it is very difficult to empty the pull. It does have a stopper, but it doesn't allow the water to drain very well. The seating is pretty comfortable, but the space between the seat and the wall is a great place for gunk to grow. It is just too much maintenance for a smaller pool. I could live with the other flaws if it would just stay inflated longer.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold water. Not strong enough to support over an inch of water. Soooo dissatisfied. A total waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Jaworski

customer_reviews.title: Not good value
customer_reviews.text: Was very nice while it held air. Had to refill with air everyday whether used or not. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Deflated after 24 hours. Inflated 3 times but it kept going down. 120 gallons of water wasted. I wanted to try another one but decided not to take the chance since I was not the only one with this complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool Did Not Hold Up.  Intex does NOT Warranty
customer_reviews.text: The pool has small holes and after using dye, soapy water, and shaving cream (pool company suggestion) looking for the hole. We could not find it. Due to COVID, Intex is not taking calls. We emailed them almost a month ago for suggestions. Their response was to push it off: As a valued Intex Consumer your feedback is greatly appreciated. Unfortunately that product does not have any warranty or service program associated with it. Any exchange would come from the retailer in accordance to their policy. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and hope this unfortunate situation does not discourage you from choosing Intex in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was big enough for me to sit in the water with my granddaughter and play. It was pretty easy to set up by myself but needed help to empty water and put up
customer_reviews.author: Net

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Very Happy with my purchase! Haven't had any problems with not holding air, as stated in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Nebehay

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Basic, Good!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a budget friendly way to submerge in some water during hot days in my small apartment yard. This did the trick! I was able to use my bike pump and some ingenuity to pump it up by myself. It is comfortable and had enough space for three adults to enjoy at the same time without feeling cramped! I fully expected it to last one day and then pop, but we used it daily for a week and only refilled air once to add more structure. I bought it knowing that it might only last a short while, so am happy with my purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Larrieu Casias

customer_reviews.title: The best way to use it is if you have those ...
customer_reviews.text: Unless you always have 4 people ready to sit in this at the same time, it has issues holding people up. The best way to use it is if you have those 4 in to counter-balance each other. One of my worst, least-used purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Maynard

customer_reviews.title: This was a ton of fun this summer
customer_reviews.text: This was a ton of fun this summer. The kids loved it and with the built in seats it was far more comfortable for us to sit in there with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lounger for small spaces. We fill it up just enough for our toddler to splash around and us to sit with our legs in, works perfectly for us!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tannehill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good product for what it cost. We inflated it and put it in our backyard. It fit two adults and two big dogs comfortably. Great for a hot day just to lay around in and tan
customer_reviews.author: Mads

customer_reviews.title: Great to cool off and float!
customer_reviews.text: I am 57 and i do lots of yard work. I have been wanting to build a pool . This was great to lay in and cool off it was like floating in a pool. I love this im going to have a pool party lol. 10 minutes to fill with air. With a pump. About 15 minutes to fill with water. I would suggest a net to clean and a tarp to put it on also I ordered a cover so it will stay clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in the winter since it was difficult to get last year. Opened the box, blew it up....one of the seats wouldnt hold air and overnight the pool deflated. Customer service refused to refund or send a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Karen R Schmeltzle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold air, defective product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea. We went to great lengths to prepare the spot on our deck for the pool, complete with a soft surface. The pool was lopsided when inflated and leaks air. Now, it requires pumping up several times a day. Currently, it's losing air and water is pouring out the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions and actually put it on a carpet to protect against punctures. Filled it on a Friday and by Sunday the main air chamber was almost out of air. Never again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Great option for lounging
customer_reviews.text: Great option to have easy to use pool for summer. I drained it and cleaned it pretty easily too. Now looks brand new again. Good option if you don’t want to bother with a pool with pump . This is great as a lounge pool
customer_reviews.author: k.higgins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love my relax and keep cool swim center. We did have to patch it right after we aired it up, but that was because the wind caught it and blew it into a wire.
customer_reviews.author: Vanette

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Thought this pool would be great but set it up plans was to get in the pool on Sunday but it didn’t hold the air I looked for any holes couldn’t find any pumped it up again air came out again and pool drained out never even got to put my foot in it
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tanning
customer_reviews.text: Great suntanning or hanging out with the little ones. This is the second time I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: TMarie

customer_reviews.title: Fun For All
customer_reviews.text: Was good for a few days at the 4th of July. Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steve & Teri McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool and it would not hold air. Every morning the air would be out and water would have come all out of the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshop2016

customer_reviews.title: Pool
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money very nice my friends like it to
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it Love it Love it. It sits on my deck and my friends and I can keep cool while in the sun! Suggestion: get children's foam interlocking blocks for underneath if put on a hard surface! A little thin for your knees and I'm old!
customer_reviews.author: Audg

customer_reviews.title: Great size and comfortable but doesn’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the body of the pool won’t hold air. The seats do but I have to constantly fill the body and I can’t find the leak. I can’t return as I threw away the packing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to move
customer_reviews.text: Too much to handle but exactly what it said it was
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Drain plug faulty !!
customer_reviews.text: Do not pull the drain plug! The first time we tried to drain this pool the drain plug circle came out of the pool causing a hole!! Such a poor design for such a nice pool.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a hot summer day! The kids enjoyed having their own seats! Need to buy an air pump. We purchased the suggested pump. Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Vivi's Grandma

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if it was a little deeper and alittle more ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be better if it was a little deeper and alittle more durable but otherwise is a refreshing break
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Cumley

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation of product
customer_reviews.text: The photo of this product represents 4 seats and that is what I expected. The one that was sent to me only has 2. Extremely disappointed in the misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: I like this but when a few people get in it
customer_reviews.text: I like this but when a few people get in it,say 2 people it loses water out of one of the sides. Also hard to get level!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Diehl

customer_reviews.title: leaked air from the word go
customer_reviews.text: product was what i expected but leaked air for the first time setting up. refilled with air 3x in 12 hrs. very disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA EBY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sit well, have to have 4 people in it to have it even worth sitting in
customer_reviews.author: Greg Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews before you buy
customer_reviews.text: It definitely looks more comfortable then it actually is. It’s impossible to sit and lean back on the chair part.
customer_reviews.author: richard d kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Pool
customer_reviews.text: I had it up not even for one full day and the pool would lose air
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air!
customer_reviews.text: The idea was great.....but it only holds air for about 6 hours. Can't seem to find a leak. Very disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for $$
customer_reviews.text: Prefect backyard pool to sit in to cool off with a good cocktail!
customer_reviews.author: Adam96pd

customer_reviews.title: It sucks i want my money back
customer_reviews.text: It sucks it does not say up it has holds in the sean we don't even get to us it. Please don't get this pool
customer_reviews.author: Norma Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material. One side wont stay inflated. Very upsetting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A tree limb popped it before I could enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: ice Queen

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This piece of crap showed up riddled with holes. Do not order this junk.
customer_reviews.author: shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So convenient Iam having knee 2ndknee surgery and it is wonderful. Easy get in & out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do like sitting in it tho
customer_reviews.text: It's a pain to clean all the time...I do like sitting in it tho....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is not really worth that.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is not really worth that. Could have ost half that much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool! It is large enough to fit four adults plus two kids. I recommend investing in an air pump to blow it up. Whenever it wasn't in use I placed it in my garage and deflated the main pool portion, but left the seats blown up. Takes about 5 minutes to inflate/ deflate. It does have a plug at the bottom to release the water if you wish to leave the pool blown up. This pool is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine1027

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this as a family Lounge pool
customer_reviews.text: It had a hole, and you could not fill the water to the line with out it bulging. I do not recommend this as a family Lounge pool.
customer_reviews.author: April Mallette

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this and it didn't look the quality I ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it didn't look the quality I expected for the money asking for it. I've asked for returning it and seller wasn't very Courteous I just wanted information on what to do. Hasn't been a pleasant experience with the uncalled for attitude.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hale

customer_reviews.title: Could be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband absolutely love this pool. Yes the price is a little outrages, when you could get it at Walmart for like 40 dollars. But of course for that price they where sold out for 2 weeks. What really sucks now that it has a slow leek in it now.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was really cool the first week.. It ended up having a slow small leak a week after purchase that couldn't be found so the patch and pool both are worthless... Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gina Provenzo

customer_reviews.title: For the amount we paid I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The pool is not holding air. For the amount we paid I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kucsma

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't able to use it... Came with a hole at the seam. Too much work to return
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: com/dp/B01BP1SYRS/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_0 make it look like a couple a medium size people can get in ...
customer_reviews.text: you make it look like a couple a medium size people can get in there to have fun and relax.``you also charge for it at WAL-MART
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a cheap air pump to inflate and that went pretty quickly. No holes
customer_reviews.text: So this just arrived very quickly 2 days ago. I ordered a cheap air pump to inflate and that went pretty quickly. No holes. Filled it up, and it looks and works great. So far no issues with it. It's great for just lounging in this hot AZ weather.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stickney

customer_reviews.title: Hole in pool
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. Really lousy piece of a pool. Do not do not buy. Holes in the headrest and never held the air in the pool itself. Smh. Company want return because I bought it in march(thirty day return). We put up the pool two days ago. The grandkids came and we're very disappointed. 😤Faces
customer_reviews.author: Sandy O.

product_meta.title: Intex Relax And Keep Cool 57191WL Swim Center Family Lounge Pool, Holds 221 Gallons Water, Blue
product_meta.description: Intex Swim Center Family Lounge Pool is perfect for a family to relax and keep cool from the summer heat! A comfortable backrest and four cushioned seats make this the perfect pool to relax in while watching your little ones play! Pool holds 221 gallons and includes a drain plug for faster water drainage and a repair patch for your convenience.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars174 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
